thread.title: Kareena Kapoor Steps Out In That One Colour, That We All Love To Hate, For Rangoon’s Screening
thread.title_full: Kareena Kapoor Steps Out In That One Colour, That We All Love To Hate, For Rangoon’s Screening

title: Kareena Kapoor Steps Out In That One Colour, That We All Love To Hate, For Rangoon’s Screening
text:
facebook 
Your feelings for the colour, olive, may have never seen beyond “ugh”, but prepare to have that drastically changed. Proud mother and newly-converted risk taker, Kareena Kapoor, emerged in head-to-toe olive, featuring a trench coat and yogini-style wrap pants, both from Chola. 
A matching tank top was worn underneath to deliver flawlessly on this monotone look. For accessories, stylist Mohit Rai picked a choker from Eina Ahluawalia’s recent collection, Battlecry (shop the collection, here ). 
Softly tousled hair, textured pointed pumps, and heavily kohled eyes in place, Bebo looked oh-so-appropriately-ready for the screening of husband, Saif Ali Khan’s movie, Rangoon . In case you’ve been on the lookout for dressed-up earthy, this look should help you rise to the occasion. Picture Credits : Viral Bhayani
